statements: SELECT * FROM FishingActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_date, fishing_location FROM FishingActivities WHERE fish_species='Tuna';
SELECT fish_species, fish_quantity FROM FishingActivities WHERE fishing_quota > 1000;
SELECT * FROM FishingActivities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(fish_quantity) AS avg_fish_quantity FROM FishingActivities WHERE fishing_location='Pacific Ocean';
SELECT * FROM FishingActivities WHERE fish_species = 'Salmon' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, fish_species, fish_quantity, fishing_location FROM FishingActivities WHERE fish_quantity > 100 ORDER BY fish_quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT fishing_location FROM FishingActivities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT fish_species, SUM(fish_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM FishingActivities GROUP BY fish_species HAVING SUM(fish_quantity) > 500;
SELECT AVG(fish_quantity) AS average_quantity, MAX(fish_quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(fish_quantity) AS min_quantity FROM FishingActivities WHERE fishing_quota > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fisherman;
SELECT name, age FROM fisherman WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT fish_species FROM fishing_quota;
SELECT id, name, address FROM fisherman WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT end_date, fish_species, total_amount FROM fishing_quota ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fisherman WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, address FROM fisherman JOIN fishing_quota ON fisherman.id = fishing_quota.quota_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, age FROM fisherman WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT fish_species, total_amount FROM fishing_quota WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fisherman WHERE id IN (SELECT quota_id FROM fishing_quota WHERE total_amount < 500);
SELECT * FROM Fisherman;
SELECT name, age FROM Fisherman ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT address FROM Fisherman WHERE age > 30;
SELECT f.name, fq.fish_type, fa.activity_date FROM Fisherman f, FishingQuota fq, FishingActivity fa WHERE f.id = fa.fisherman_id AND fq.quota_id = fa.quota_id ORDER BY fa.activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FishingQuota WHERE valid_from < '2022-01-01' AND valid_to > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Fisherman;
SELECT name, age FROM Fisherman WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM FishingQuota WHERE valid_from > '2022-01-01' AND valid_to < '2023-01-01';

SELECT Fisherman.name, FishingQuota.fish_type, FishingActivity.location FROM Fisherman JOIN FishingActivity ON Fisherman.id = FishingActivity.fisherman_id JOIN FishingQuota ON FishingActivity.quota_id = FishingQuota.quota_id;

SELECT Fisherman.name, FishingActivity.activity_date FROM FishingActivity JOIN Fisherman ON FishingActivity.fisherman_id = Fisherman.id WHERE FishingActivity.activity_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM fishing_vessels;
SELECT vessel_name, registration_date FROM fishing_vessels ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT vessel_name, fishing_license_number FROM fishing_vessels WHERE vessel_id = 2;
SELECT catch_id, catch_species, catch_weight FROM fishing_catches WHERE catch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_description FROM fishing_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fishing_vessels;
SELECT vessel_name, registration_date FROM fishing_vessels ORDER BY registration_date DESC, vessel_name;
SELECT log_description FROM fishing_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT vessel_name, COUNT(catch_id) AS total_catches FROM fishing_vessels LEFT JOIN fishing_catches ON fishing_vessels.vessel_id = fishing_catches.vessel_id GROUP BY vessel_name;

SELECT fc.catch_date, fv.vessel_name, fl.log_description FROM fishing_catches fc JOIN fishing_vessels fv ON fc.vessel_id = fv.vessel_id JOIN fishing_logs fl ON fc.catch_id = fl.catch_id ORDER BY fc.catch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fishing_Zones;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, country FROM Fishing_Zones ORDER BY country;
SELECT vessel_id, vessel_name, vessel_type FROM Fishing_Vessels WHERE vessel_type='Trawler';
SELECT log_id, vessel_id, zone_id, fish_type, catch_amount, log_date FROM Fishing_Logs WHERE catch_amount > 100;
SELECT c.catch_id, l.log_id, l.vessel_id, l.zone_id, c.species, c.weight FROM Fishing_CatchData c INNER JOIN Fishing_Logs l ON c.log_id = l.log_id;
SELECT * FROM Fishing_Zones;
SELECT zone_name, country FROM Fishing_Zones ORDER BY zone_name DESC;
SELECT vessel_name FROM Fishing_Vessels WHERE vessel_type = 'Trawler';
SELECT zone_name, country, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM Fishing_Zones JOIN Fishing_Logs ON Fishing_Zones.zone_id = Fishing_Logs.zone_id GROUP BY zone_name, country;
SELECT zone_name, SUM(catch_amount) AS total_catch FROM Fishing_Zones JOIN Fishing_Logs ON Fishing_Zones.zone_id = Fishing_Logs.zone_id GROUP BY zone_name ORDER BY total_catch DESC;
